title.default: AI Automation Agency | Custom Business Automation | Yoluko Solutions

metadata.description: Yoluko is an AI automation agency that builds custom solutions for your business. From automated reporting to AI assistants, we help you save time and improve efficiency. Contact our automation agency in Lyon, France for a free consultation.

HeroSection.title: Stop Wasting Time on Repetitive Tasks
HeroSection.subtitle: Custom automation solutions tailored to your business needs. Reclaim your time and focus on what truly matters.

ValueProposition.title: Custom Solutions for Your Unique Business Challenges
ValueProposition.time_desc: Transform hours of work into minutes with automation that handles your entire workflow.
ValueProposition.no_hidden_fees_desc: Transparent monthly subscription, no upfront fees.
ValueProposition.compatible_desc: Connects with any platform you already use.
ValueProposition.ai_desc: We apply AI strategically, only where it delivers real business value.

YolukoDifference.title: Relax, Our Solutions Handle Everything
YolukoDifference.description: At Yoluko SolutionS, the 'S' means multiple customized solutions that adapt to your unique processes - not the other way around!

SolutionsShowcase.title: Your Business Challenges, Solved

solutions.title: Data Insights Dashboard
solutions.description: All your business data in one place, automatically organized. Make better decisions with up-to-date information from every source.

solutions.title: Automated Reporting Assistant
solutions.description: An assistant that delivers your key performance summaries directly to your team's inbox on a daily, weekly, or monthly schedule.

solutions.title: Automated Reconciliation Specialist
solutions.description: A virtual specialist that processes weeks of financial transactions in minutes with 99.8% accuracy, even handling tricky, unusual cases.

solutions.title: Live Operations Monitor
solutions.description: An automated monitor that sends instant notifications via Slack or email for the metrics that matter most, before small issues become big problems.

solutions.title: On-Demand AI Business Analyst
solutions.description: A secure, conversational AI you can ask any strategic question about your business and get instant, data-backed answers.

solutions.title: AI Social Media Manager
solutions.description: An AI manager to maintain your social presence consistently without the daily grind. Boost engagement by 40% while reducing content creation time by 75%.

solutions.title: Automated HR Assistant
solutions.description: An automated assistant to help you find, screen, and shortlist the best candidates for any open role.

solutions.title: Automated Trading Strategist
solutions.description: A 24/7 strategist that turns your trading ideas into a fully automated system. Backtest, optimize, and deploy with precision.

SolutionsShowcase.custom_solution_desc: Don't see your specific need listed? If you can describe it, we can automate it. We build completely custom solutions for any business problem.

About.title: The Expert Behind Your Solution
About.name: Alexandre Kocev
About.bio: My journey from developer and data analyst to an AI & automation specialist is driven by one goal: solving your unique business problems. When you partner with Yoluko, you work directly with me to build a custom solution that gives you back your most valuable asset—time.

TechIntegration.title: Seamless Integration With Your Tech Ecosystem
TechIntegration.description: Using a specialized tool? No problem, our technology integrates with EVERY system on the market

FAQ.title: Questions You Might Have
FAQ.q1: How do you handle unexpected scenarios?
FAQ.a1: Our AI automation solutions include robust exception handling and automated monitoring to flag any issues, which we promptly address as part of your subscription.
FAQ.q2: What if our business processes change after automation?
FAQ.a2: Our team is here to help! We can easily update and adapt your solution as your business evolves.
FAQ.q3: Will my team need technical skills to use the solution?
FAQ.a3: Absolutely not. We design intuitive, user-friendly interfaces that anyone on your team can use with minimal to no training.
FAQ.q4: How do you ensure our data is secure?
FAQ.a4: We use enterprise-grade security protocols and host our solutions on secure cloud platforms like Google Cloud, ensuring your data is always protected.
FAQ.q5: What's included in the monthly subscription?
FAQ.a5: Everything: initial development, deployment, hosting, ongoing maintenance, security updates, and dedicated support.
FAQ.q6: How long does implementation typically take?
FAQ.a6: Depending on complexity, a custom automation solution is typically ready in 2-6 weeks, with minimal disruption to your daily operations.

ContactSection.title: Start with a Free Strategy Session
ContactSection.subtitle: This is a one-on-one discovery call, not a sales pitch. We'll dive into your biggest operational challenge and map out a custom automation plan, completely free of charge.
ContactSection.process_step1_desc: Takes 2 minutes. Briefly describe the repetitive task that wastes the most time.
ContactSection.process_step2_desc: Pick a 30-minute slot from the calendar that works for you. No obligation.
ContactSection.process_step3_desc: We'll analyze your needs and come to the call prepared with initial ideas and a plan to solve your problem.
ContactSection.challenge_placeholder: Describe your processes, let's see together how to automate your business.
ContactSection.quick_chat_link: Prefer a quick chat first? Book a 15-Minute Intro Call
ContactSection.toast_description: We'll get back to you soon.

success_page.title: Message Sent!
success_page.message: Thank you for contacting us. We will get back to you shortly.
